meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tova Meyer Melissa Jurgens Jared Hall Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6667.

td.p: Tova Meyer, a graduate student in education from Princeton, New Jersey
Melissa Jurgens, a lawyer from Arlington, Virginia
Jared Hall, a graduate student in global policy studies from Austin, Texas (whose 3-day cash winnings total $88,401)

tr.td: ISLANDS
NAME-DROPPING SONGS
JUST CURIOUS
POTENT POTABLES
(Alex: With Kathie Lee and Hoda.)
DIRECT FROM THE DICTIONARY
OP-EDS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'There are more than 600 gigantic stone figures on this island')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: There are more than 600 gigantic stone figures on this island

toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'A classic:
"Good Golly, Miss ____"')

A classic:
"Good Golly, Miss ____"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_3_1', 'clue_J_3_1_stuck', 'He first appeared in a kids\' book called "Raffy and the Nine Monkeys" before headlining his own series')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: He first appeared in a kids' book called "Raffy and the Nine Monkeys" before headlining his own series

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_4_1', 'clue_J_4_1_stuck', '(Kathie Lee and Hoda give the clue.) As Nick Charles says in "The Thin Man", it\'s all about the rhythm in the shaking--you shake a Manhattan to fox trot time but you use waltz time to shake a dry one of these gin drinks')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Kathie Lee and Hoda give the clue.) As Nick Charles says in "The Thin Man", it's all about the rhythm in the shaking--you shake a Manhattan to fox trot time but you use waltz time to shake a dry one of these gin drinks

toggle('clue_J_5_1', 'clue_J_5_1_stuck', '(Melissa: What is infertile?)

sterile

MelissaTova
')

')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_4_2', 'clue_J_4_2_stuck', '(Kathie Lee and Hoda give the clue.) After you swirl the wine, look for the rivulets that slide down the inside of the glass; they\'re called tears or these, which usually mean the wine is full-bodied')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Kathie Lee and Hoda give the clue.) After you swirl the wine, look for the rivulets that slide down the inside of the glass; they're called tears or these, which usually mean the wine is full-bodied

tr.td: (Kathie Lee and Hoda give the clue.) We tried a month of on-air sobriety, but as it turns out, antioxidants in red wine may help prevent heart disease by raising the HDL or the good type of this & lowering the bad type

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_4_4', 'clue_J_4_4_stuck', '(Kathie Lee and Hoda give the clue.) A magnum of wine equals 2 standard bottles of wine; yes but you can really have a party with the size named for this Babylonian king--by the way, it\'s the equivalent of 20 standard bottles')

')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_4_5', 'clue_J_4_5_stuck', '(Kathie Lee and Hoda give the clue.) French scientists say the best method of pouring champagne is down the side of the glass, which preserves up to twice as much of this gas, keeping the fizz in your bubbly')

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 14):

tr.td: Jared
Melissa
Tova

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Jared
Melissa
Tova
I MADE UP YOUR MIND
(Alex: You have to identify the author for us.)
ANATOMY
(Alex: And in honor of the anniversary of the signing of our constitution, clues about our rights in...)
CONSTITUTION DAY
BALLET DANCERS IN THE CINEMA
AMERICANA
"OP" ENDS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_5_4', 'clue_DJ_5_4_stuck', '(Vice President Biden reads the clue.) While the President has "Hail To The Chief" as his official song, the Veep has "Hail" this, once a poetic name for the United States; until the 1890s, it also served as de facto national anthem for America')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Vice President Biden reads the clue.) While the President has "Hail To The Chief" as his official song, the Veep has "Hail" this, once a poetic name for the United States; until the 1890s, it also served as de facto national anthem for America
